body:
I've spoken to people who have translated and uploaded my work in the past.
Foolish he said.
"If you translate your work, upload it, and have people from other countries read it, you'll get publicity, your work will sell, and you'll make a profit."
I'm not getting a tenth of the money I should be getting.
I'm in debt, I'm drawing comics, and I need support.
Support on "fantia" and "Ci-en" I accept money transfer via paypal
https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/nekodel

FUck I'm so lucky I knew the game before reading this otherwise id be confused as shit

@neko_del bro I don't think you're the real guy. Even if you were it's pretty difficult to buy Japanese doujinshi sold on japanese sites when you don't know japanese. Your only option is something like fakku but that's selling your soul to the devil. Other than that you could make your doujinshi japanese instead since you can speak english damn well.
This is a parody of Succubus Prison: House of Lewd Demons.
@neko_del I purchased some of your works, I hope it helps you a bit. I love your art.

@L0lic0пwizard I'm not saying that all of these opinions are wrong, but sales are definitely down.
I just can't stand the fact that people who have a fuller life than I do don't care that I'm literally cutting my life to draw, and admire me all they want.
But hey I could be wrong, I'm just a random person on a hentai website after all.

@neko_del i think not many of the people here would actually read hmanga if it wasn't for this website so those people wouldn't of known about or brought your hentai anyway, but I'm sure there are some who won't buy it because they can read it for free here but I also think there are some who will buy it because they saw it here and liked it so it probably works out about the same as if this place didn't exist so don't worry too much about it.

@RataMistica
This piece is only two dollars.
That's less than a child's allowance.
And the amount of damage to this site alone is more than ten times the amount of money I got from this work.
I can live like a normal person with this money,
@neko_del Dude, there are a lot of ways to make money with good art. That alone makes me doubt that you are the actual artist, anyways.

Please pay me for my work.

I can't live like this anymore.
God, what a lucky bastard! I wish he was me!
this needs context from the og game lol, love me some vinum though
Not into snuff no thanks human life is precious imo👍
It feels like it should be much longer
